p: Model AUC scores ranged from 0.79â€“0.86 ( Table 1) for Maxent models, indicating generally good discrimination of presence locations from other locations [ 51]. The single-species models performed similarly to the peatland model, whereas the all-species model performed slightly less well than the other models ( Table 1). Except for RF (AUC 0.9), all consensus model algorithms had comparable AUC with the Maxent models. However, only RF performed consistently well.
